document.full_text: south korea's top internet portals filed a complaint on friday with antitrust regulators against google inc, alleging the search giant was unfairly stifling competition in the domestic mobile internet search market.
document.title: south korean portals file competition complaint against google
lines_and_colors: south korea's top internet portals filed a complaint on friday with antitrust regulators against google inc, alleging the search giant was unfairly stifling competition in the domestic mobile internet search market.
